checks.description: Verify navigation to Daily Wage Calculation settings is accessible
checks.selector_hint: Settings menu > Payroll section > Daily Wage Calculation link
checks.assertion: Page should load with Daily Wage Calculation configuration interface

checks.description: Verify calculation basis options are available (calendar days, working days, custom days)
checks.selector_hint: Calculation basis radio buttons or dropdown selector
checks.assertion: All three calculation basis options (calendar days, working days, custom days) should be selectable

checks.description: Verify salary components selection interface exists
checks.selector_hint: Salary components checkbox group or multi-select field
checks.assertion: Salary components selection control should be present and functional

checks.description: Verify current calculation basis selection is displayed
checks.selector_hint: Selected calculation basis indicator or active option highlight
checks.assertion: Currently selected calculation basis should be visually indicated

nav.canonical: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure

checks.description: Verify navigation to End of Service eligibility configuration
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure path
checks.assertion: EOS eligibility configuration page should load successfully

checks.description: Verify salary component selection for EOS (Basic Only vs Basic + Allowances)
checks.selector_hint: Salary components radio buttons or toggle for EOS configuration
checks.assertion: Options for Basic Only and Basic + Allowances should be available

checks.description: Verify calculation method options for EOS (calendar, working, custom days)
checks.selector_hint: Calculation method selector for EOS
checks.assertion: All calculation method options should be selectable

checks.description: Verify override indicator for eligible paid leave-type policies
checks.selector_hint: Override warning or notification message for leave policy overrides
checks.assertion: Super admin should see indication that eligible paid leave-type policies will be overwritten

checks.description: Verify individual leave type configuration for EOS calculations
checks.selector_hint: Leave type configuration controls or list
checks.assertion: Leave types should be configurable for EOS calculations

checks.description: Verify navigation to Daily wage calculation for proration settings
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Payroll > Daily wage calculation
checks.assertion: Daily wage calculation page should be accessible

checks.description: Verify calculation basis selection for salary proration
checks.selector_hint: Calculation basis options (custom days, calendar days, working days)
checks.assertion: All calculation basis options should be available for proration

checks.description: Verify proration settings state and active configuration display
checks.selector_hint: Current proration configuration display or status indicator
checks.assertion: Current proration settings should be visible and editable

checks.description: Verify warning message about open payroll month and prorated transactions
checks.selector_hint: Warning message or notification about payroll month status
checks.assertion: Warning should appear when payroll month is open with existing prorated transactions

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to unpaid leave policy configuration
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option
checks.assertion: Unpaid leave policy configuration page should load

checks.description: Verify calculation method options in unpaid leave policy
checks.selector_hint: Calculation method selector in unpaid leave configuration
checks.assertion: Calculation method options should be available

checks.description: Verify day calculation type options (calendar, working, custom days)
checks.selector_hint: Day calculation type radio buttons or dropdown
checks.assertion: Day calculation type options should be selectable

checks.description: Verify override indicator showing payroll settings take precedence
checks.selector_hint: Greyed-out formula field or override precedence message
checks.assertion: Visual indicator should show that payroll daily wage calculator overrides this policy

checks.description: Verify formula display state (greyed-out or disabled when overridden)
checks.selector_hint: Formula display field or calculation method field
checks.assertion: Formula field should appear greyed-out or disabled when payroll override is active

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to unpaid leave policy with override context
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies configuration path
checks.assertion: Leave policy configuration should be accessible

checks.description: Verify indication that global unpaid leave daily rate overrides policy settings
checks.selector_hint: Override message or disabled field indicator
checks.assertion: System should indicate global configuration takes precedence over policy-level settings

checks.description: Verify policy-level customization controls state when global override exists
checks.selector_hint: Policy-level calculation method controls
checks.assertion: Controls should show disabled or read-only state when global override is active

checks.description: Verify messaging about configuration hierarchy and precedence
checks.selector_hint: Help text or info message about configuration hierarchy
checks.assertion: Clear messaging should explain that global settings override policy-level configurations

nav.canonical: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure

checks.description: Verify navigation to EOS configuration for proration verification
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Payroll > End of Service eligibility > Configure
checks.assertion: EOS configuration page should load

checks.description: Verify EOS calculation configuration display and formula visibility
checks.selector_hint: Calculation method display and formula fields
checks.assertion: Calculation method and formula should be visible in configuration

checks.description: Verify remarks or notes field displays calculation details
checks.selector_hint: Remarks field or calculation details display
checks.assertion: Remarks should display relevant calculation information

checks.description: Verify daily rate display in EOS configuration
checks.selector_hint: Daily rate field or calculation rate display
checks.assertion: Daily rate should be displayed with appropriate precision

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to leave salary calculation configuration
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies path
checks.assertion: Leave policy configuration should be accessible

checks.description: Verify daily rate divisor configuration options (30, 31, calendar days)
checks.selector_hint: Daily rate divisor selector or calculation basis option
checks.assertion: Daily rate divisor options should be selectable

checks.description: Verify override indicator for leave salary calculation
checks.selector_hint: Override message or precedence indicator
checks.assertion: System should indicate how leave salary calculation is determined

checks.description: Verify policy configuration state and current settings display
checks.selector_hint: Current policy configuration display
checks.assertion: Current policy settings should be visible and editable

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to unpaid leave configuration with remarks display
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies configuration
checks.assertion: Leave policy configuration page should load

checks.description: Verify remarks field displays daily wage calculation details
checks.selector_hint: Remarks field in unpaid leave configuration
checks.assertion: Remarks field should be present and display calculation information

checks.description: Verify daily rate value displayed in remarks section
checks.selector_hint: Daily rate display in remarks
checks.assertion: Daily rate should be displayed with correct day count reference

checks.description: Verify calendar days reference in remarks matches actual month days
checks.selector_hint: Days reference text in remarks (e.g., '31 days', '29 days')
checks.assertion: Days reference should reflect actual calendar days for the month

nav.canonical: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies > Add new policy > Unpaid Leave option > calculation method > day calculation type

checks.description: Verify navigation to unpaid leave configuration for rate display verification
checks.selector_hint: Settings > Leaves > Leave Policies path
checks.assertion: Leave policy configuration should be accessible

checks.description: Verify stored daily rate is displayed (from leave occurrence month, not payroll month)
checks.selector_hint: Daily rate display field in remarks or configuration
checks.assertion: Daily rate should display the rate from leave occurrence month, not recalculated from payroll month

checks.description: Verify daily rate display is consistent across payroll cycles
checks.selector_hint: Daily rate field or remarks section
checks.assertion: Daily rate should remain consistent and not change based on payroll processing month

checks.description: Verify initially calculated rate is preserved and displayed
checks.selector_hint: Rate preservation indicator or stored rate display
checks.assertion: System should preserve and display the initially calculated rate
